actions.recommendation: Keep up to date with cancer screening.
Evening Primrose oil may help ease some of the menopausal symptoms you occasionally experience.
Monitor for any urinary symptoms. Drink a lot of water to flush the kidneys and continue with over the counter treatment that you started yesterday. Repeat dipstix in a few days.
Suboptimal vitamin D level - supplement with D3 5000iu daily and recheck level in 3 months aiming for a level of 50 to 80ng/dl

The right ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz. The left ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz & 4kHz. A full audiogram is recommended to establish the cause of the hearing loss & how to manage it. Please see an audiologist.
Keep up to date with cancer screening.
Cancer screening is important as you grow older. Prioritise these screenings & look out for any changes or abnormalities.

The right ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz. The left ear has mild hearing loss at 500Hz & 4kHz. A full audiogram is recommended to establish the cause of the hearing loss & how to manage it. Please see an audiologist.
Supplement with folate & B vitamins to help lower homocysteine.
